author: Adam K. Raymond
title: Trump Boosts Tweet Calling for Anthony Fauci to Be Fired
description: The doctor said fewer people would have died with earlier social distancing. That’s obvious, and to Trump, potential grounds for dismissal.
content:
President Trump on Sunday retweeted a call to fire Dr. Anthony Fauci, the governments top infectious-disease expert whose steady competence during the coronavirus outbreak has stood out during the Trump administrations otherwise botched response.
The origina… [+2428 chars]
